title: Milla Jovovich
summary: Milica Bogdanovna Jovovich[lower-alpha 1][lower-alpha 2] (/ˈjoʊvəvɪtʃ/ YOH-və-vitch; born December 17, 1975), known professionally as Milla Jovovich, is an American actress, supermodel, and singer.[2] Her starring roles in numerous science-fiction and action films led the music channel VH1 to deem her the "reigning queen of kick-butt" in 2006.[3] In 2004, Forbes determined that she was the highest-paid model in the world.[4]
